Class CardPanel

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class CardPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Panel that displays cards for viewing/selecting/using.

Constructor Detail

CardPanel

public CardPanel(java.util.LinkedList<Card> newCards,
                 int columns,
                 javax.swing.JButton actionBtn,
                 javax.swing.JButton doneBtn)
Creates a new CardPanel panel.

Parameters:
newCards - cards that will be displayed
columns - maximum number of cards that will be displayed on a horizontal axis
actionBtn - button that will perform a preset function on the selected card; if null, button is not displayed
doneBtn - button that will perform a preset function to finish with the card panel
